item.title: #TIL : Convert tabs to spaces
item.description: Convert tabs to spaces This is my config to use 4 spaces instead tab filetype plugin indent on set tabstop=4 set shiftwidth=4 set expandtab To convert existing file from tabs to spaces, use this command

item.title: #TIL : Using mark to bookmark checkpoints in files
item.description: Using mark to bookmark checkpoints in files Bookmarking a checkpoint will help you get back to it intermidately.
